tweets.content:
Find the products that are META proof...

What do I mean by this?
Find the things that can excel regardless of what the current trend is, across the market.

The answer is, Metaplex.

Look at ALL The various metas on Solana.
- AI
- CCM
- Streaming
- Internet Capital Markets
- Animal Coins
&& so much more, including ALL The huge opportunities coming out of their Genesis launch system.

Look at the current trend of REAL revenue business coins absolutely excelling.

You know who benefits REGARDLESS?
Metaplex.

They power ALL of this on the Solana blockchain.
When you ARE the entire production line, operators, the infrastructure layer in the equation of everyone searching for opportunity, you are the REAL winner.

It's been amazing to work with @metaplex and continue to push awareness to their ecosystem as a partner.

tweets.content:
the best part about the ‚Äúrevenue meta‚Äù is that it isn‚Äôt a meta at all, it‚Äôs just a sustainable business

and last month Metaplex had its highest revenue from token creation in the last 7 months - meaning half of the revenue going towards $MPLX buybacks for the DAO

so nearly 1% of the outstanding token supply was bought back LAST MONTH‚Ä¶truly and honestly, who‚Äôs doing it like Metaplex????

when a gold rush hits, you‚Äôre usually better off focussing on picks and shovels instead of the gold itself :)

Metaplex crushing it is a HUGE testament to what the industry standard should be for all web3 companies, I  couldn‚Äôt be more proud for them to power this post like they do the rest of Solana ü¶æ

tweets.author: metaplex

tweets.content:
We're at an interesting spot now with Genesis where we set out to test each launch mechanic and learn and literally everything worked (??)

Allowlist presale for @DeFiTuna ($TUNA) and  @_portals_ ($PORTALS) 

Launch pool for @Collector_Crypt ($CARDS)

Auction for @exotic_markets_ ($EXO)

Presales are great when you have high confidence how the market values your token and you can price reasonably below to create interest and a real incentive for an allowlist campaign. 

Launch pools are perfect for building a wave and getting a large group of early supporters on the same page supporting the project and onboarding new users.

Uniform Price Auctions work best when you're appealing to large traders and funds that want to bid in size but at specific levels. Because everyone gets the same price, you get some of the same benefits of a launch pool.

Still working out the playbook but the good news is that there's no excuse for botched token launches anymore. And the onchain market is showing up for quality teams and products. Only gets better from here.

github.com/metaplex-foundati‚Ä¶

tweets.author: metaplex

tweets.content:
5/ Shank fits right into the Metaplex dev stack:

‚Ä¢ Used by Kinobi to generate modern clients

‚Ä¢ Already used in major Solana programs like Token Metadata & Bubblegum
tweets.author: metaplex

tweets.content:
4/ Now with full docs you can go from:

‚Ä¢ Native Rust code
‚Ä¢ Add Shank macros
‚Ä¢ Run Shank IDL
‚Ä¢ Get a complete, production-ready IDL
‚Ä¢ Build your own SDK or pass it to your frontend team

All with detailed docs to guide you through.
tweets.author: metaplex

tweets.content:
3/ Without an IDL, connecting a frontend to your smart contract is painful. With Shank, you get that IDL automatically, and from there, tools like Kinobi or Solita can generate full TypeScript SDKs for you.

No more glue code.
tweets.author: metaplex

tweets.content:
2/ What is Shank?

It‚Äôs a set of Rust tools and macros that extract all the info about your program‚Äôs instructions, accounts, and types, and outputs an IDL (Interface Definition Language) file.

Think of it as the blueprint for building client apps.
tweets.author: metaplex

tweets.content:
1/ Writing Solana programs in Rust?

Shank lets you turn that code into something frontend devs can actually use by generating an IDL (interface) that tools like Kinobi and Solita use to build TypeScript SDKs.

Now it has full docs. Here‚Äôs why that matters üßµ

tweets.author: metaplex

tweets.content:
5/ Uniform Price Auctions are one solution of many that Genesis provides to ensure token launches are fair & transparent.

The first launch powered by a Genesis Auction is @exotic_markets_ on September 10th.
tweets.author: metaplex

tweets.content:
4/ If you're like me, you might not be tracking. Here's a simple example:

Someone is selling 10 bananas.

Nom offers $5 per banana and wants 6 total
Threadguy offers $4 per banana and wants 3 total
Clemente offers $3 per banana and wants 1 total
Anatoly offers $2 per banana and wants 7 total

Clemente's bid sets the "clearing price" since it's the lowest bid that still accounts for all the bananas being sold. Anatoly gets no bananas and Nom + Threadguy only pay $3 per banana and can claim their overbid back.
tweets.author: metaplex

tweets.content:
3/ Like any auction, it's important to avoid last minute sniping.

For this reason, any bid in the final moments of the auction extends the timer by a few minutes giving others a chance to respond.

Also, the clearing bid (lowest winning bid) can be a partial fill depending on how much supply is available at that offer.
tweets.author: metaplex

tweets.content:
2/ Uniform Price Auctions are actually quite simple

1. Users place a bid designating their price per token and token amount
2. The auction fills in real-time, ranking bids from highest to lowest
3. Once full, the lowest winning bid sets the clearing price
4. All winners pay the same price & can claim an overbid refund

All of this is easily trackable on the live auction interface where you can close, open and update bids based on the auction stats. You can always easily see if your bid is currently winning or losing.
tweets.author: metaplex

tweets.content:
